arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
footnotes: Musa akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Mimi nina khofu wasije kuukataa ujumbe wangu kwa kiburi na inda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
